summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SpellQuest: Cove MVP - a kid-friendly CVC spelling game. All core features tested successfully with pure HTML/JS/CSS implementation served from React public directory.

integration_issues.issue: Unable to determine current randomized word during automated testing. Game uses shuffled word bank making automated testing challenging
integration_issues.note: This is expected behavior - words are intentionally randomized for gameplay variety

passed_tests: Hub page loads with correct title 'SpellQuest: Cove' and navigation buttons
Crystal counter initializes to 0 and persists via localStorage
Quest page loads with enemy 'Echo Glitch', full HP bar, 3 CVC letter slots
QWERTY keyboard renders with all 26 letter keys and responds to clicks
Keyboard interaction fills letter slots sequentially
Clear button empties all filled letter slots
Error feedback displays 'Not quite. Try that word again.' for incorrect words
Success feedback triggers HP decrease, crystal increase, and word progression
Back to Hub navigation works from both quest and spell helper pages
Spell Helper page loads with input field and Show & speak button
Word input creates letter breakdown with clickable chips
Enter key triggers word processing in spell helper
Crystal counter persists across page navigation
No JavaScript console errors detected across all pages
